alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 06 at 1:54PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following areas, Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Garfield, McCone, Petroleum, Prairie and Southwest Phillips. * WHEN...This afternoon through early tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Due to a stalled weather pattern, thunderstorms and heavy rain have been recurring across the region over the last several days. Another round of storms this afternoon through tomorrow morning would add to an already saturated ground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Southwest Phillips
